titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1495) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of outpatient prescription drugs under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Stark. Petition No: 106-8.

bill.summary: 11/9/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1495 (coverage of outpatient prescription drugs under the Medicare Program).
